reviews.text: Its a big open space, lit warmly with a lot of wood.   Has inside and outside dining. The hostess that greeted us was quite friendly.  We chose to sit at...

FR Burger* Single Smash Patty, Giardiniera mayo, Aged Cheddar Cheese, Onions, B & B Pickles on Buttery Bun 
Giardiniera Mayo  
Raspberry Ginger Mocktail...

Fantastic drinks. Always run into someone fun. 

Great menu. I've to try the sauerkraut and pork meatball appetizer.
